title: M8: Type and size of training data matters!
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: intermediate. * SUPERVISION: self-assessment/teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 2 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: awareness of data sizes is usually not well managed when you are not familiar to NMT. This activity could open a discussion on this topic.
